      public void addPlayer​(Player player)
      Adds a player to the list of players in the game
      Parameters:
      player - the player to add
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if player is null
      PlayerException - if player is already in the game

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(java.lang.String player)
      Removes the player and its associated workers from the game
      Parameters:
      player - is the player i want to remove
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if player is null
      PlayerException - if a player is not in the game

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Changes the state of the game model by alterating the current player
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there are no players in the game

    • getCurrentPlayerNickname

      Returns:
      nickname of the current player
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if there are no players in the game

    • isFullRound

      public boolean isFullRound()

      Returns:
